name: Frogue (EGB Games)
description:
FrogueAn infinite hopping prototype

Made this mid-2014 but gave up on it as I was unsure of its viability as a fun game. There should be some scrolling backgrounds that change as you go to different tilesets but I never quite got it working. Still, it's kinda fun!

Controls:

  • Click and drag to hop
  • Right click to lick towards your mouth

How To Play:

  • Get as far as you can without falling down or running out of food
  • Collide with or pickup up flies with your tongue to refill your food bar
  • Can also use the tongue to pull yourself to objects and platforms
